name: FeatureCardEight
description: Horizontal timeline feature section with auto-advancing progress bars, numbered step badges, and shared media display.

description.example: Discover how we bring ideas to life

id.note: Step number displayed in circular badge

description.example: Understanding user needs, market trends, and project requirements

imageSrc.note: Either imageSrc or videoSrc required per card (discriminated union)

videoSrc.note: Either imageSrc or videoSrc required per card (discriminated union)

imageAlt.note: Falls back to feature title if not provided

videoAriaLabel.note: Falls back to feature title if not provided

itemRules.note: Works best with 2-4 features. Grid layout adapts based on item count.

propsSchema.features: Array<{ id: number, title: string, description: string } & ({ imageSrc: string, imageAlt?: string } | { videoSrc: string, videoAriaLabel?: string })>
propsSchema.title: string
propsSchema.titleSegments?: Array<{ type: 'text', content: string } | { type: 'image', src: string, alt?: string }> - For inline images in title
propsSchema.buttons?: Array<{text: string, onClick?: () => void, href?: string}>
propsSchema.textboxLayout: 'default' | 'split' | 'split-actions' | 'split-description' | 'inline-image' (required - 'inline-image' uses titleSegments for rich text with images)

usageExample: <FeatureCardEight features={[{ id: 1, title: 'Research & Planning', description: 'Understanding user needs, market trends, and project requirements', imageSrc: '/feature1.jpg' }]} title="Our Process" description="Discover how we bring ideas to life" textboxLayout="default" useInvertedBackground={"noInvert"} />
dont: Do not use more than 4 items
Do not use less than 2 items
Do not use more than 4 items
